name: Cat'Em_Up
description:
This is my first Game : Cat'Em_Up. 

It's a classic shoot'em up with cut cats, dogs and animals. There are 5 different levels, an infinite mode (maybe a secret level, why not ?), and a shop with various skins.
It took me 3 weeks/1 month to make it so I hope you will enjoy, even if it's just a little. I did all the graphics and the development, and i used free musics by "airtone", "Fupicat" and "myfox14" (thanks to them).

I'm a beginner so if you find bugs, please report them to me to improve the Game.

I used GameMaker to make the Game, Pixel Studio for the graphics, and jsfxr for some sounds (everything is detailed in the Credits of the Game).

Thanks a lot to my friends for their support but specially to my parents, and to Ilyes, Augustin and Benjamin.

I really hope that you will enjoy this short Game.
